TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataGridCell extends System.ValueType

remarks.format:
## Remarks 합니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> 와 함께에서 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> 속성을 셀의 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> 속성을를 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> 포커스가 지정 되는 셀을 이동 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>합니다.
## Examples 다음 예제에서는 합니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 선택된 된 셀의 열 및 행 수를 반환 합니다. 에 저장 된 값을 <xref:System.Data.DataTable> 를 사용 하 여 인쇄 되어 합니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> 개체의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>합니다.
[!code-cpp[Classic DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ColumnNumber { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ColumnNumber : int with get, set

remarks.format:
## Remarks 사용할 수 있습니다를 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> 지정할 값을 <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> 에 <xref:System.Data.DataTable> 연관를 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 컨트롤.
## Examples 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> 의 속성을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>합니다. 에 저장 된 값을 <xref:System.Data.DataTable> 지정 하 여 반환 됩니다 <xref:System.Data.DataRow> 및 <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> 를 통해 개체를 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> 속성입니다.
[!code-cpp[Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
